name: Krampus is Home
description: Sebastian is a teenager who is waiting for his parents to come back home on a cold Christmas night. Soon he realizes that there is something evil lurking around. Experience Sebastian 's journey into a Surreal world like no other.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10. Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 610M or equivalent. Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
